Heading: Worth the money

The cons I felt is that the watch faces weren't that attractive and the battery level is not as promised. It drains off quickly. Last only 3-4 days, when it was promised for 10days. Overall it's a good smartwatch at a decent price.

Cons: Noisefit app is worst

Overall you can go for it blindly without any doubt.
The finish and design is far better than the 2nd gen watch.
Nice job by Noise team.

Heading: Pretty good
Review: It's a very catchy watch that noise has released at this price point giving out so much features which you only get in high range smartwatches. The display is the main highlight. Haven't seen any display like this so far on any budget smartwatch. It's so slim. Not a bit bulky like its other competitors. It really is a awesome watch.

Heading: Simply awesome
Review: As Mentioned very light weight watch which is biggest highlight of this watch . Display is really cool even in outdoor. Worth for this price. Battery average outs to 7 days . Activity tracking is good.. but for sleep monitoring we need to wear it tightly which is little uncomfortable.. if worn normally then tracking data do not gets captured properly. Overall in this price segment best quality, with premium look smart watch.

Heading: Very Good
Review:
Really a good smartwatch in this price range. I have been using this watch from last one month and it is working fine. Good display good bettery backup. Only two things I would like to add and enhance in this watch are:
1. More design oriented Custom watch face, currently only three available and are simple in design.
2. Can see the true caller name if it is not added in your phone number list. Would like to show caller name for the unknown person.

Review:
Simply wow. Amazing smarth watch. Looks is stunning.Heart Rate monitoring in accurate and many watch faces are there.

Nice work amazefit waiting for next version of it.

Review:
The watch looks weighty, but is quite light. The screen is great, with 392 ppi which helps it being able to prevail even in sunlight.
It does lose GPS connection indoors which stops it from counting steps.
The number of watch faces in the zepp app is also quite low, but there exists a custom app on playstore for getting more watch faces.
The number of sports modes in the watch is quite low but its accuracy is good.
Overall it is a great smart watch for a price of 6499/-

Heading: Best in the market!
Review:
No nonsense tracker, at an amazing price. Delivers what promised and very accurately. The PAI feature is really good. The best thing i liked is the gps lock-in time, the battery backup, charging time and screen always on and auto pause feature during workout. But changing watch faces time in 3rd party apps should be improved. The watch is really rugged as advertised the military grade and all is actually seems true.

Nice work amazefit waiting for next version of it.

The watch looks weighty, but is quite light. The screen is great, with 392 ppi which helps it being able to prevail even in sunlight.
It does lose GPS connection indoors which stops it from counting steps.
The number of watch faces in the zepp app is also quite low, but there exists a custom app on playstore for getting more watch faces.
The number of sports modes in the watch is quite low but its accuracy is good.
Overall it is a great smart watch for a price of 6499/-

Overall it is a great smart watch for a price of 6499/-

4. The OS is simple.

Review:
Superb watch in super price.

Review:

1. Battery life is awesome, on an average of ~14% consumption per day.
2. Inbuilt workout mode is super accurate (I have used it for indoor as well as an outdoor run, Elliptical and Swimming)
3. Heart rate monitoring works like a charm, except when you are driving two-wheeler on Bangalore roads.
4. Stress monitoring, Notifications, Weather report, and other features are good too.

It's a must-buy product if you are for a good smart...

3) Allow all permissions for Google

3) Allow all permissions for Google
